author: fnathan
title: Manchester United transfer news: Lyon president Jean-Michel Aulas says Memphis Depay is chomping at bit to show his ‘immense talent’
text:
EFL depay the price Manchester United transfer news: Lyon president Jean-Michel Aulas says Memphis Depay is chomping at bit to show his ‘immense talent’ 
Ligue 1 side's chief expect the deal to be tied up in 48 hours which end Dutchman's nightmare spell at Old Trafford By Fred Nathan
